TitleAndOnePlan.description: Internxt Drive allows you to back up your cloud storage and protect your files from ransomware and data loss protected by post-quantum encryption.

TitleAndOnePlanV2.title: Cloud storage backup solutions for data protection and recovery

WhySwitchSection.title: Why you should switch to private cloud storage solutions
WhySwitchSection.subtitle: Switching to private cloud storage solutions guarantees your data stays private and secure from hackers and corporations. Unlike Google, Apple, or Microsoft, Internxt doesn’t collect, sell, or misuse your data. You have complete control over your files.
WhySwitchSection.description: Invest in your privacy and get peace of mind that your files and data are protected against data breaches.

title.line3: for personal, business, or enterprise use

WhatWeDo.subtitle: Choose Internxt for secure cloud storage so your files are always backed up, easily recoverable, and protected from data loss.

square1.title: Internxt Drive
square1.description: Internxt Drive is one of the most private and secure cloud storage backup solutions for your data. With it, you are protected from ransomware with automated and scheduled backups for your folders. On top of that, all your folders are protected with zero-knowledge encryption, meaning you have total control of your data and privacy.

square2.title: Internxt S3
square2.description: Internxt S3-compatible is an online backup cloud storage option that suits businesses and enterprises to manage large amounts of data. With predictable pay-as-you-go pricing and zero data transfer fees, your organization won’t be charged for restoring or accessing your backups, keeping your costs predictable and data secure.

FeaturesSection.title: How Internxt Drive can backup and protect your files
FeaturesSection.description: Internxt offers private cloud storage and secure backups protected by post-quantum cryptography to give you total control of your files and maximum protection for your folders.

info.title: Automatic backups
info.description: Internxt allows you to back up to cloud storage manually or schedule your folders for automatic backups daily, hourly, or every 6 or 12 hours. By automatically backing up your folders, you ensure they are regularly updated and securely stored in the cloud for easy recovery in case something goes wrong.

info.title: Ransomware protection
info.description: Cloud storage backup solutions protect your files against ransomware by allowing you to restore and recover files that are locked and encrypted by a ransomware attack. Cloud-based backup storage means you can regain access to your folders and files without paying extortionate fees or losing your data.

info.title: Protected by post-quantum encryption
info.description: Internxt is the first cloud storage backup solution to use post-quantum cryptography to protect files you store, share, and back up. Our Post-quantum encryption uses algorithms designed to resist these quantum attacks, ensuring your backed-up data remains secure even as technology advances.

info.title: Data redundancy
info.description: Internxt’s cloud storage backup solutions encrypt and back up multiple copies of your data across multiple servers for maximum protection and data recovery. This increased redundancy in our cloud-based backup storage ensures that if one copy of your files becomes corrupted, lost, or inaccessible, other copies are available elsewhere for quick recovery.

info.title: Open source and audited
info.description: Our cloud storage is fully open source and available to view via our GitHub page for full transparency on how your data and files are protected. Internxt also passed an independent security audit by Securitum, verifying that your cloud storage for backup ensures your files are safe and protected against hackers and cyberattacks.

info.title: Access your backups from any device
info.description: You can back up to cloud storage from your preferred device or platform, as Internxt is available on Windows, Mac, Linux, iOS, or Android. You can also back up your files using WebDAV or Rclone for easier management of your backups and access your data remotely on your preferred device.

CtaSection1.title: Back up your files with Internxt

CtaSection2.title: Back up with confidence
CtaSection2.description: Total protection against ransomware, data loss, or corruption

faq.question: How does Internxt protect my data?
answer: Internxt uses award-winning Kyber-512 post-quantum cryptography and zero-knowledge encryption to ensure only you have access to your files. All your files are encrypted on your device before they are sent to the cloud, preventing anybody, including Internxt, from viewing the contents.
You can also activate Two-Factor Authentication to prevent unauthorized access to your account.

faq.question: How often should I back up to cloud storage?
answer: With Internxt, you can back up your folders at different intervals to suit your needs. The more frequently you backup your files, the less data you will lose in case of an emergency. For this reason, we recommend daily backups for maximum protection or more frequently depending on how often your data changes.

faq.question: How do I restore my data from cloud storage?
answer: To restore your backups, log in to your Internxt Drive account via our website, navigate to backups, and select the device and folder you wish to download to access the backed-up folders.e

faq.question: What is the difference between cloud storage and cloud storage backup solutions?
answer: Cloud storage focuses on saving and managing the files that you need to access or share regularly in the cloud.

Cloud storage for backup, like Internxt Drive, also lets you create copies of your folders for increased data protection, ensuring they can be recovered in case of accidental deletion, data loss, or cyberattacks.

Backup solutions are designed to create secure copies of your data for protection. Backup solutions automatically store data at regular intervals, ensuring it can be recovered in case of data loss due to failure or accidents.

faq.question: How do I contact support?
answer: Can't find what you're looking for? You can contact our Customer Success team via live chat or by sending an email to hello@internxt.com.

faq.question: Can I pay with credit card, PayPal, or cryptocurrency?
answer: Internxt currently accepts debit and credit cards (Mastercard, VISA, American Express, etc). You can also pay via PayPal, iDEAL, Sofort, and Cryptocurrency.

FeatureSection.title: Cloud storage backup solutions
FeatureSection.titleLine2: No matter what happens to your device, backing up your files means your important photos, files, and memories can be recovered forever.

element1.title: Increased protection
description: Files can be lost for any reason, such as device failure, malware, ransomware, or other factors outside our control. Creating backups in the cloud lets you automatically save copies of your files in a secure, encrypted environment, even if your device is lost, stolen, or damaged.

Cloud storage backup solutions create copies of your files, encrypt them, and store them in multiple locations for quick access and data recovery. You can control the schedule of these backups to suit your needs, minimizing the chances of losing important files and protecting against common cybersecurity threats like ransomware.

element2.title: Recover your files
description: Without a backup system in place, recovering your files becomes extremely difficult or even impossible.

When you back up your files with Internxt, copies of the files are backed up across multiple servers for extra security, protection, and data recovery. This offers a dependable, quick, and easy way to regain access to your files and guarantee their protection for the future.

element3.title: Ease of use
description: Managing backups manually can be time-consuming and challenging to manage for multiple folders. The process becomes much simpler once you set up backups with cloud storage providers such as Internxt.

Internxt Drive can run your backups automatically without requiring any action; whenever you need to regain access, you can restore your file in just a few clicks. You can protect against advanced cyberattacks with cloud storage backup solutions regardless of technical skill.

element4.title: Cross-platform access
description: It’s essential to have access to your files no matter where you are and no matter what device you’re using. With Internxt, you can manage your cloud storage and backups from our Windows, Mac, or Linus apps. WebDAV and Rclone support are also available for increased accessibility.
By offering multiple ways to access and manage your backups online, you can retrieve and manage your data effortlessly, making it easier to work and collaborate from anywhere.
